quiz.title: Google Cloud Data Protection and Security Best Practices Quiz

questions.questionText: Which statement best describes a data lake?
options: A. Storage optimized for high-throughput writes.
B. Data storage intended for analytics.
C. Storage for current/historical data intended for reporting.
D. The place where you capture every aspect of your business operations. Data is stored in its natural, raw format.
questions.explanation: A data lake is the place where you capture every aspect of your business operations. Data is stored in its natural, raw format.

questions.questionText: Which of the following statements on Cloud Storage are true?
options: A. Cloud Storage simulates a file system.
B. Data in Cloud Storage is not encrypted.
C. Cloud Storage allows you to set retention policies on all objects in a bucket.
D. Cloud Storage implements both IAM policy and Access Control Lists.
questions.explanation: Cloud Storage simulates a file system. It allows you to set retention policies on all objects in a bucket and implements both IAM policy and Access Control Lists.
